summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Department of Parks and Recreation, authorizing the payment of certain Relocation Expenses to Evergreen Florists, Inc.; authorizing the transfer and credit of the accumulated and uncollected asset of rental monies due the City as partial off-setting payment therefor; accepting a gift from Evergreen Florists, Inc. of a portion of said relocation expenses and making an appropriation for payment of the remaining balance due Evergreen Florists, Inc.
